title: Rhythm, Rhidoy, and Resonance
author: Rhythmandrhidoy
description: Integrative Medicine - Dr. Sudeshna Dasgupta, MD, MPH
cleaned_text: Welcome to the Integrative Medicine practice of Dr Sudeshna Dasgupta! Please feel free to explore our site to learn what we do as a practice, and if you have any questions at all, please feel free to reach out to our office by phone at 828-505-2108 or by submitting one of the three forms on this website. For any and all other needs you can reach out to Crystal at crystal.integrativemedicine@gmail.com and she will be happy to help guide you for all your needs.
